modules.name: Remove Child Infected
modules.description: Removes child-like visuals from all biters, virals, and banshees in the world

modules.name: WarZones
modules.description: The city is called to arms during the day to reclaim their territories. All human enemies will run in packs around the city. This is not compatible with Volatiles Begone or Infestation

modules.name: Custom Map Data
modules.description: CUSTOM MAP CHANGES: (!Work in Progress!) May cause quest bugs/frame loss, adds new custom locations to the Windmills and Bazaar Exterior.
